MemoryInfobox.name: Precious Bridle
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Bandits stole a secret message without knowing what they had, as the message was inscribed on a bridle stolen from a merchant.'

General_Description: '''Precious Bridle''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a note left on the [[message board]], and decided to look into it.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I picked up your message on the board. What's happening?''
*'''Woman:''' ''A [[merchant]]'s been robbed,'' misthios''! He was supposed to sell a bridle to me today... I need it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Then buy one from someone else. Why do you care that a merchant was robbed?''
*'''Woman:''' ''This bridle... It contains secret information about [[Sparta]]'s next move, but bandits have it in their camp.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to get it from the bandits?''
*'''Woman:''' ''That's exactly it. Will you do it for me?''
(Accept - I'll bring it to you.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.''
*'''Woman:''' ''The gods are smiling on me, then.''
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire.
Kassandra left the spy, and located the bridle in the bandits' camp. Once it was in her possession, she returned to the spy.
*'''Woman:''' ''Did you get it?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.''
*'''Woman:''' ''Thank you for all you've done. Please, take this.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
